system.effect: The blow slices into the side of the target's head causing his eyes to pop out and his brain to ooze down his cheek like spilled jelly. He is dead before he hits the ground.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Head (Severity 8)

The blow slices into the side of the target's head causing his eyes to pop out and his brain to ooze down his cheek like spilled jelly. He is dead before he hits the ground.
